HomePage.greeting: HOW FAR NA, WELCOME TO MY WEBSITE
HomePage.MOTIVATION: My journey wey carry me enter web development start with my brothers and sisters wey encourage me make i try tech. At first, e hard me because i no know how i go take enter the field, but i don alreay put my mind say i go learn how to code one day. As i dey watch films, i dey always admire that idea wey dem dey call 'laptop and hoodie'. This new interest come make me start to dey try HTML and CSS, I use my secondary schood days build front-end websites and dey explore CSS animations through trial and error, as i be full stack developer now, i nor fit imagine myself for any other place.

Features.firstDescription: I fit turn that idea wey you get to picture wey nor dey wash.
Features.secondDescription: If you wan make website i go make am over fine anybody wey enter your website go confirm say e go well.
Features.thirdDescription: normally if you make website hackers dey like spoil show for you, but if i help you make am dem nor born dem well say dem go fit hack am
Features.fourthDescription: This level wey you see so people suppose focus on am, e get why but dem nor dey do am well but i go run am for you perfectly.
Features.fifthDescription: Before i even start project i go settle down reason am make i nor go make mistake wey go come spoil show for you.
